definition: to press/to extract (juice)/device for extracting juice, oils etc

sentences.english: He makes fresh orange juice with an electric extractor.
sentences.chinese: 他用电动榨汁机榨取新鲜的橙汁。

sentences.english: Automatic juicing machine that you can operate to get fresh squeezed orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 自动榨汁机，你可以把新鲜的操作鲜橙汁。

sentences.english: With this juice extractor you can make 100% pure fruit juice and vegetable juice.
sentences.chinese: 您可使用本榨汁机榨出100%的纯果汁和蔬菜汁。

sentences.english: To blend means to puree, or turn to a thick liquid, in a liquidizer.
sentences.chinese: 混合成浓汤，或是在榨汁机里变成浓浓的液体。

sentences.english: How much do you sell this juicer for?
sentences.chinese: 这台榨汁机你卖多少钱？

sentences.english: Squeeze the fruit with your hand and not using juicing machine.
sentences.chinese: 挤压的水果用您的手和不使用榨汁机。

sentences.english: When you use the juicer you do not get the anti-aging nutrients at all.
sentences.chinese: 当您使用榨汁机你就无法得到抗衰老营养素在所有。

sentences.english: A wringer is a useful tool to make juice.
sentences.chinese: 榨汁机是制作果汁的工具。

sentences.english: Thank you for your purchase of Philips Juice Extractor.
sentences.chinese: 承蒙购买飞利浦型榨汁机。

definition: to peel/to remove the skin/to tare
milkshake (Note: 昔[xi1] is loaned from English "shake" via Cantonese 昔, pr. sik1)
